mapper.select: select m.name, mg.member_id, m.avatar, g.id as groupId, g.name as groupName from sys_member_group mg left join sys_group g on mg.group_id = g.id left join sys_member m on mg.member_id = m.id where mg.status = 'NORMAL' and mg.group_id = #{groupId} and mg.group_id in (select group_id from sys_member_group where group_id = #{groupId} and member_id = #{memberId})
select member_id from sys_member_group where 1 = 1 and group_id = #{groupId}

select s.name, s.avatar, s.id as memberId, g.member_id as groupCreateMemberId from sys_member_group mg left join sys_member s on mg.member_id = s.id left join sys_group g on mg.group_id = g.id where 1 = 1 and mg.group_id = #{groupId}
